text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @VP You are insane. Your handling of this pandemic has been FUBAR sunce day 0. You have failed this country and will forever be known as THE WORST PRESIDENT IN HISTORY. The president that said “I din’t take responsibility at all”
